body: Well this code assumes that `type` is a numeric type, so you better at least put a comment somewhere. Apart from this, I really do believe that we should do the casting in `addInputs` and not in here. You're claiming that this method is for "Values that don't need special handling" after all.
body_html: Well this code assumes that type is a numeric type, so you better at least put a comment somewhere. Apart from this, I really do believe that we should do the casting in addInputs and not in here. You're claiming that this method is for "Values that don't need special handling" after all.
body_text: Well this code assumes that type is a numeric type, so you better at least put a comment somewhere. Apart from this, I really do believe that we should do the casting in addInputs and not in here. You're claiming that this method is for "Values that don't need special handling" after all.
